heading: HR02568
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY, COMMITTEE ON ACCOUNTABILITY OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE ALLEGED UNDUE AND IMPROPER DELEGATION AND EXERCISE OF AUTHORITY BY CERTAIN OFFICERS OF THE DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ENACTING REMEDIAL MEASURES FOR THE EFFECTIVE IMPLEMENTATION OF REGULATIONS FOR THE POWER INDUSTRY

status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-05-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02568
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY, COMMITTEE ON ACCOUNTABILITY OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE ALLEGED UNDUE AND IMPROPER DELEGATION AND EXERCISE OF AUTHORITY BY CERTAIN OFFICERS OF THE DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ENACTING REMEDIAL MEASURES FOR THE EFFECTIVE IMPLEMENTATION OF REGULATIONS FOR THE POWER INDUSTRY
